name: GetPlayerCameraZoom
notes: This retrieves the zoom level of the GAME camera, not the camera WEAPON.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3z and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Retrieves the game camera zoom level for a given player.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to get the camera zoom level of.

return_values: The player's camera zoom level (camera, sniper etc.), a float.
